entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Issue with zip headers general purpose flags bit 11 for OPC packages. #87658
  • Support resolving metadata tokens in MetadataLoadContext #87657
  • `ILLink.RoslynAnalyzer.DynamicallyAccessedMembersAnalyzer` threw an exception of type 'System.IndexOutOfRangeException' #87647
  • [NativeAOT] ObjectWriter for MacOS should be built and published from the Main branch #87644
  • CurrencyNegativePattern can be 16 #87643
  • [NativeAOT] Implement a compiler "optimize for application" switch analogous to /GA for MSVC #87642
  • Remove traceparent header from http requests #87635
  • [API Proposal]: Additional ToFrozenDictionary overloads with optimizeForReading #87633
    8.0.0
  • [8.0-preview.5] Possible Issue with AsyncLocal<T>/TaskCreationOptions.RunContinuationsAsynchronously #87628
  • [API Proposal]: Interface for Exceptions that have child/aggregate Exceptions #87625
  • Can not build System.Runtime solution inside VS. The type or namespace name 'SearchValues<>' could not be found #87624
  • [wasm] Microbenchmarks failing with assertion `Assertion at /__w/1/s/src/mono/mono/component/marshal-ilgen-stub.c:28, condition `!m_type_is_byref(t)' not met` #87623
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Illegal forwardsub with physical promotion enabled (missing interference checks for assignment) #87614
    8.0.0
  • Minimizing size of Dotnet WebAssembly Browser app #87617
  • JIT: Physical promotion can create some writebacks too late #87611
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Properly implement targeting iOS-like platforms rather than pretending to be macOS #87610
    8.0.0
  • X509Certificate2(Byte[]) constructor fails with certain password-less PFX-contained certificates #87608
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Windows/arm64: 4 Regressions on 6/12/2023 7:14:25 PM #87626
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 1 Regression on 6/7/2023 7:43:49 PM #87639
  • Access Violation in jithelpers with Dynamic PGO enabled #87597
  • Dataflow analysis taking forever #87596
  • Querying a DC via System.DirectoryServices.Protocols hangs on macOS #87589
  • Ref-packs built on Windows platform do not include all Intellisense files #87585
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Problem with name clashes in nested types, when using JSON source generator #87645
  • Add support for SHA3 (Keccak) #20342
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration.Tests have issues with BigInteger and records on netfx #63802
    Future
  • Test failure reflection/Tier1Collectible/Tier1Collectible/Tier1Collectible.sh #74730
    8.0.0
  • Test failure BasicEventSourceTests.TestsManifestGeneration.Test_EventSource_EtwManifestGenerationRollover #87117
    8.0.0
  • JsonSerializer.Deserialize(... JsonSerializerContext context) Ignores configurations in JsonSerializerContext #80634
    8.0.0
  • GC out of memory inside the docker container #87063
  • System.Text.Json code generation fails on recursive IReadOnlyDictionary #76802
    8.0.0
  • Enable Library-Level Preview Features #77869
  • runtime - Specify all source-built dependencies and ensure they are regularly updated #74765
    8.0.0
  • llvm-project - Specify all source-built dependencies and ensure they are regularly updated #74764
    8.0.0
  • Inconsistent internal field handling between `JsonSourceGenerationMode`s #70928
    8.0.0
  • Can't use [JsonSerializable] with [Cloneable] source gen #65361
    8.0.0
  • Consider JSON srcgen diagnostic when typeof(object) found in type object graphs #53935
    Future
  • System.Threading.RateLimiting is missing XML documentation for public API #87604
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json source generator failes if type to serialize is named `Options` #71547
    8.0.0
  • JSON serializer source generator produces warnings for types with nullable generic parameters #61734
    Future
  • Order of serialized properties determined by dictionary enumeration on fast-path source generators #59043
    Future
  • Remove Arcade HelixResultsDestinationDir workaround #75169
    8.0.0
  • [mono][simd] Mono functional tests failing due to invalid OP_NEGATION instruction type #87606
    8.0.0
  • List<T>.Enumerator is still boxed #87616
  • Enable building NativeAOT for Apple mobile platforms #81024
    8.0.0
  • System.IO.IOException: Unable to write data to the transport connection: Broken pipe. #87521
  • GeneratedComInterface interfaces should emit a diagnostic for non-static properties and events #87158
    8.0.0
  • WasmTemplateTests.ConsolePublishAndRun fails with exit code 137 #87414
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fully qualify return type on UnreachableException methods #87661
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2202051 #87660
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Check Locations length before accessing #87659
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Optimize if range check to replace jumps to bit operation #87656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Use an older sdk for WBT #87646
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Ensure that the various Min and Max APIs are accelerated where possible #87641
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • add support for https proxy #87638
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Remove KeyValuePairConverter. #87637
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Can not build System.Runtime solution inside VS. The type or namespace name 'SearchValues<>' could not be found #87636
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • Limit number of tracked values in trim dataflow analysis #87634
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Faster optimized frozen dictionary creation (2/n) #87630
    area-System.Collections, tenet-performance
  • [wasm] Fix inclusion of `marshal-ilgen` component #87629
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, perf-pipeline
  • Add ContainsAny{Except} #87621
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Improve dynamic heap count #87619
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix budgets for dynamic heap count and add smoothing to overhead computation #87618
    area-GC-coreclr
  • JIT: Add a check for forward sub assignment interference #87615
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Insert writebacks in proper post-order location #87612
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make sure intellisense files are copied to the ref pack output for the current TargetOS #87603
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • feat: usability suggestion (avoid annoying KeyValuePair) #87602
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution
  • Fix `File.Copy` onto a symlink on macOS #87600
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Add DebuggerDisplay to some hosting types #87599
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • [Release/7.0-staging] Allow GetILFunctionBody for dynamic methods #87598
    Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • Build integration support for Bionic in NativeAOT #87595
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Speed up KeyAnalyser #87590
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Clean up JIT flags #87588
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WIP] Options validation source generator #87587
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Options, 8.0.0
  • [IGNORE][wasm] debugging 7.0 aot failures #87586
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono

Merged

  • SHAKE128 and SHAKE256 #87099
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, cryptographic-docs-impact, 8.0.0
  • Don't set mark array bits for UOH objects during concurrent marking #87533
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Re-enable disabled BigInteger tests. #87640
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Add regression testing for #76802. #87632
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Implement `ExperimentalAttribute` #85444
    area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add DOTNET_JitDisasmWithCodeBytes #87580
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Ignore CORJIT_FLAG_VECTOR512_THROTTLING sometimes under stress #87631
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add missing API docs to RateLimiting #87627
    area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • Ensure the JIT consistently does opportunistic queries for its optimizations #87620
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • [mono][exceptions] Don't attempt to catch StackOverflowException #87601
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono][interp] Refactor icall opcodes #87269
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2201684 #87613
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix parameter ordering and value in gtNewColonNode #87366
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Stop setting HelixResultsDestinationDir #86413
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix mcs missing flags #87584
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][simd] Add MONO_TYPE_I and MONO_TYPE_U types for OP_NEGATION on amd64 #87607
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Avoid linking to non-existent System.Net.Security.Native on tvOS #87605
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [CoreCLR/NativeAOT] `UnsafeAccessorAttribute` non-generic support #86932
    area-VM-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Add managed entry points for raising Contention events #87087
    area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • Remove some unnecessary Substrings #87479
    area-Meta
  • Make the soure generator format enums using their identifiers rather than numeric values. #87557
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [RISC-V][JIT] Fix FCVT #87591
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [RISC-V] Fix struct passing on reflection calls #87535
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2201397 #87570
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Package static libraries into NativeAOT runtime pack #87594
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix jitdump issues introduced by #85801 #87547
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Report warnings for COM interfaces with instance properties or events #87492
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Enable option to use the Windows ThreadPool #85373
    area-System.Threading
  • [wasm] Don't use `_WasmDevel=true` when publishing #87544
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Extend Task.FromResult default task optimization to 16 byte unmanaged types #87541
    area-System.Threading.Tasks

Updated

  • Optimize GetType with known type #87579
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Import isinst/castclass Nullable as underlying type #87241
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Invoke startup hook from ApplyStartupHook diagnostic command #87490
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Restore removed API from Extensions #85846
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging
  • [WIP] HttpClientHandler request metrics #87319
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wip][nativeaot][tests] Add smoke runtime tests for Native AOT on iOS #87260
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Crossgen2 support for static virtual method resolution (take 2) #87438
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] ThreadStatics part 2 #87148
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Add conditional substitution for IsDynamicCodeSupported when targeting ios-like platforms #86971
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios
  • [wasm] Add some JIT helper functions to throw common corlib exceptions. #87044
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • EventPipe support for ProcessInfo #87562
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [Mono] Add mono hot reload support for updating parameter name #85796
    area-EnC-mono
  • Add opt-in support for GeneratedComInterface/ComImport RCW interop #87583
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Enable CS1591 for projects that don't use intellisense package XML file #84917
    bug, area-Infrastructure-libraries, blocking-release, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Add support for induced field accesses in physical promotion #87410
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Mono] Add the capability of trimming IL code of individual methods #86722
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [hot reload][mono] Implement support for adding static and instance fields to generic classes #87285
    area-EnC-mono
  • Apply iteration work limits to X509 certificate loading #87514
    area-System.Security, 8.0.0
  • add zero byte read to SslStream #87563
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.0
  • Optimize scalar conversions with AVX512 #84384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Implement collation native functions functions #86895
    area-System.Globalization, os-mac-os-x, os-ios, os-tvos
  • Add Support For Multiplexing `System.Diagnostics.Metrics` for `Dotnet Monitor` and `Dotnet Counters` #86504
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution
  • fix(66900): Adding test for confirm bug fix. #87167
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [browser][MT] Make HTTP and WS clients work #87567
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][globalization] `HybridGlobalization` remove code conditionally for `WasmBuildNative` #87170
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • JIT: Support last-use copy omission for commas #87548
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][tests] Parallel AOT compilation of runtime tests on iOS platforms #86089
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Make virtual delegate targets less costly #87308
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Logging middleware #87550
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging
  • [mono][interp] Fix concurrency issues with publishing transfomed imethod #87555
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • add AllowTlsResume to SslStream options #86047
    area-System.Net.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Upgrading SpanHelpers with Vector512 #86655
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Fix a couple of issues related to Process.WaitForExit on Unix #87174
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • Enable async-over-sync FileStream read/writes to be cancelable on Windows #87103
    area-System.IO

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-15
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Enable tests and fix bugs #2307
  • Type.GetInterfaceMap doesn't work for all cases #861

PullRequests

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Enable more tests and fix more bugs #2308

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Enable dynamic adaptive GC by default in Web SDK when PublishAot==true #33298
  • Add tests validating bundled Source Link #33297
  • `dotnet tool update` should mention the existing version along with the new version #33278

Closed

  • Specify all source-built dependencies and ensure they are regularly updated #27532

PullRequests

Created

  • Sequester UseArtifactsOutput logic in its own file #33310
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable dynamic adaptive GC by default in Web SDK when PublishAot==true #33309
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • Remove containerize binaries from packaging and layout for all non-windows-hosted builds #33307
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update .gitignore to ignore .env files #33305
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2202015 #33303
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #33300
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #33299
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix Source Link cross-targeting targets #33292
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #33290
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Do not look in root for .`config\dotnet-tools.json ` manifest for windows #33282
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Containers: add mappings for s390x and ppc64le platform architectures to corresponding rids. #33280
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Containers: Registry: support pulling from quay.io. #33266
    untriaged, Area-Containers

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #33248
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #33247
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.1xx #33215
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Fix R2R map generation on OSX #33225
    untriaged, Area-ReadyToRun
  • dotnet-watch: Enable nullable annotations on project level #32137
    untriaged
  • [Containers] Enable multi-RID and multi-project containerization #33166
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Add details command #31743
    untriaged
  • For templating#3553. Make search results downloads column optional #33024
    untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-15
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Interceptors #7009

PullRequests

Updated

  • Clarify how *ref-safe-to-escape*/*safe-to-escape* are calculated for inline array operations. #7272

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [BUG] Go to implementation does not work on interface methods and LSP becomes unresponsive/broken #68649
  • Add Analyzer warning when an identifier in the local scope is overriding a type from the outer scope #68648
  • Don't accumulate interceptor information outside of batch compilation #68646
  • Codelens reference counting is not updating when references are removed in other projects #68639
  • Roslyn API broke in upgrade from .NET SDK 7.0.302 to 7.0.304 #68638
    17.7 P3
  • [DebuggerStepThrough] and friends won't step through to other code if a property accessor is called from within the affected method #68634
  • MissingImports is not respecting .editorconfig #68632

Closed

  • Source generators run very unreliably (especially with multi-targeting) #67123
    Backlog
  • Specify all source-built dependencies and ensure they are regularly updated #63645
    C# 12.0
  • Void virtual methods with no body #68636
  • Source Generator files with directories are not displayed correctly in IDE #68489
  • `FieldAttributes.NotSerialized` has been marked obsolete #68626

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix msbuild for real this time #68651
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update EnC-Supported-Edits.md #68645
    Interactive-EnC, untriaged
  • Avoid loading Roslyn through All In One Search when Roslyn isn't loaded yet. #68644
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Avoid `Span` creation when indexing into an inline array with a constant. #68642
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Validate diagnostics reported by source generators #68635
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged
  • Correctly handle trivia in inline statement snippets #68633
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix inserting new values with source generators #68451
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged, Next
  • Fix LSP completion edit span computation #68643
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Use newer version of msbuild #68647
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Move ExtensionTypeTests to Emit2 project #68641
    Area-Compilers, Test, untriaged
  • Handle folders in source-generated file paths #68494
    Area-IDE, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged, Next
  • Small perf improvement during code action computation. #68631
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Refactor BindExtensionMethod method and add some assertions #68599
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Address a prototype comment #68613
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Convert xml references when moving to primary constructors #68615
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce allocations in ArrayBuilder.AddMany #68625
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Semantic snippets - `for` and `forr` snippets #68508
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Suppress formatter-based serialization warnings in MetadataWriter #68627
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Update Telemetry Package version to 17.7.47 #68528
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Update language server publishing #68504
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • VisualStudioProjectFactory: import the solution service once instead … #68630
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Use primary constructors in the 'Features' layer. #68622
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Implement "extension invocation" section for methods #68629
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations in MergedNamespaceSymbol.SlowGetChildNames #68614
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Flatten merged namespaces #67891
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Don't rebind object initializer parents #68449
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Initialize 'Flags' and 'DeclarationModifiers' in constructor of SourceMemberMethodSymbol #68347
    Area-Compilers, Concept-Design Debt, 17.7
  • Improve detection of receiver cloning in ref safety analysis #67736
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • SymbolDisplay show modifiers for default interface implementations and static abstract members #66712
    Area-Compilers
  • Add and emit ref kind for ref readonly parameters #68179
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0
  • Add 'priority' concept to our code actions, and code refactoring/fix providers. #68511
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Flesh out implementation of ref-safety rules for inline array operations. #68597
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Add PrivateAnalyzers helper assembly #68623
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Primary ctors #68477
    Area-Interactive, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NETSDK1206 error when building the aspnetcore repo with latest 8.0 Preview 6 SDK build #48842
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudAddProduct #48841
  • Perf regression: single_query #48840
  • Perf improvement: json #48839
  • Blazor puts <!--!--> all over the place #48834
  • Add Server Stack Traces in Aspnetcore Integration Tests (when test client errors) #48830
  • MAUI Blazor Hybrid Android Release: 'BlazorWebView' Fails [8.0.0 preview.5.8529] #48829
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps, fortunes #48826
  • HTTP logging + response body logging breaks gRPC. #48824

Closed

  • Render a webassembly component into the page #46354
    8.0-preview6
  • Blazor ErrorBoundary child component exception #48828
  • Specify all source-built dependencies and ensure they are regularly updated #43530
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Perf improvement: single_query, updates #48734
  • API http.sys: EnableKernelResponseBuffering #47777
    8.0-preview5
  • Enable kernel response buffering for HTTP.sys server #14455
    8.0-preview6
  • .Net Core Identity application cookie is being deleted after 30 minutes while cookie's age is 30 days #48504
  • Blazor DeserializeNoConstructor #48745
    Backlog
  • Stream Rendering works fine with cli but does full refresh with Visual Studio #48785
  • How to override `UserManager` `GetUserIdAsync` and `FindByIdAsync` method? #48825
  • GetAuthenticationStateAsync was called before SetAuthenticationState. #48806
  • Perf regression: caching, fortunes #48750
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef, json, mvc #48784
  • BlazorWasm benchmarks broken #48815

PullRequests

Created

  • Unhide server option in blazor web template #48838
    area-mvc
  • Improve WebApplication debugging #48827
    area-runtime
  • Draft: Add RedirectToActionOther method. #48823
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Remove IIS settings from Core API template. #48821
    area-mvc

Merged

  • Remove Workstation GC from the API template #48845
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview6
  • [Blazor] Add `IRazorComponentsBuilder.AddWebAssemblyComponents()` #48664
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview6
  • http.sys; add opt-in support for kernel-mode response buffering #47776
    feature-httpsys, area-perf, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking, 8.0-preview6
  • add review comment to sb files #48566
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview6
  • Implement IHostApplicationBuilder on WebApplicationBuilder #48775
    area-runtime, area-hosting, 8.0-preview6
  • Fix Blazor WebAssembly Benchmarks #48820
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview6
  • Fix missing metadata for AsParameters parameter when using RDG. #48822
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview6
  • Clean up some custom awaiters #48722
    area-signalr, 8.0-preview6

Updated

  • Add complex form binding support to RDF #48790
    area-minimal, feature-rdf
  • for CI purposes: try on-by-default #47958
    area-networking
  • Improve GetAuthenticationStateAsync exception message #48812
    area-runtime, area-blazor
  • Update milestones for August servicing #48782
    area-infrastructure, * NO MERGE *
  • Remove Blazor Server template #48615
    area-mvc, pending-ci-rerun
  • Added ppc64le architecture to support testcases on power machine. #48638
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-hosting
  • [Blazor] Take cascading parameter attribute type into account when supplying cascading values #48554
    area-blazor
  • Update RDG to use interceptors feature #48817
    area-infrastructure
  • [skip-ci] Add missing xml docs for ExceptionHandler #48814
    community-contribution, area-middleware
  • Add server option for seamless reconnect #48789
    area-signalr

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Android crash on navigate back from tab 2 without Shell #15687
  • Navigation to ContentPage make weird animation on IOS #15684
  • [Android]Entry is not unfocus when click in the button #15681
  • FileNotFoundException when I try to get the version of the assembly #15679
  • Windows: .Net 8 Preview 5 preventing me from debugging #15678
  • SelectionChangedCommand does not invoke in CollectionView twice when SelectionMode is Single on Windows #15677
  • Full-screening a window no longer removes its title-bar #15676
  • iOS app crashing on device at startup with .NET 8 preview 5 #15673
  • Scaling of root VisualElement is ignored #15672
  • MAUI DisplayAlert not modal on Android 10 #15671
  • [Android] Image with FontImageSource shows nothing after switching between the applications #15669
  • invalid GradientBrush color causes crash #15667
    Backlog
  • MAUI - CollectionView Pre Select Item background color not change on windows #15666
  • BindableLayout should pass through items that are already Views #15665
  • A11y_.NET Core_MAUI_Recipe App_Your Recipe_Keyboard : The "More options" button is not accessible by keyboard. #15664
  • A11y_.NET Core MAUI_Recipe App_Edit Recipe_Screenreader : The "Review" Label is not announced by Narrator and NVDA Screenreader #15663
  • WebAuthenticator does not extract parameters contained in a fragment (regression) #15661

Closed

  • Blazor hybrid: No content in Webbrowser after some time in background #15520
  • Switching Current Application After Initialization #11977
    Backlog
  • Android: Open App from background -> no shell navigation #11656
    Backlog
  • [Android] CarouselView loses Snap behavior using Loop and setting spacing #13053
    Backlog
  • Remove NewsstandKit Dependency to build targeting iOS17 #15660
  • Background color not changing when setting visual state and command on button #15055
    Backlog
  • Visual Studio 17.6.2 breaks MAUI on Android builds #15510

PullRequests

Created

  • [Windows] Fix issues setting Shell TabBar appearance #15690
  • Correctly identify headers/footers when using UngroupedItemsSource #15688
  • Manual updates 20230615 Android ecosystem nugets bumped #15685

    community ✨

Merged

  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.1 to 7.0.3 #15680
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [net8] Merge main to net8.0 #15674
  • Fix sizing issues with CollectionView on Windows #15587
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [net7.0] Handle Grid * expansion when size is larger than minimum, but less than sufficient to display full size #15653
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [net7.0] Catch InvalidProtocolBufferException creating EncryptedSharedPreferences #15650

    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.WindowsAppSDK from 1.3.230502000 to 1.3.230602002 #15639
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [main] Updates to new released packages #15648
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Fix IsSpellCheckEnabled #15459
    area/controls 🎮
  • Fix issues setting Shell TabBar appearance #15447
    t/bug, t/breaking 💥, platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢, needs-breaking-change-doc-created

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Documentation: Update code snippets in README files with `using` declarations (without braces) #31088
  • How to use ChangeTracker.Entries to audit database updates/deletes/inserts #31087
  • Prune all SelectExpressions, not just those in Tables #31083

PullRequests

Created

  • Documentation: Use using declarations in README files #31089
  • Run tests on .NET 8 #31086

  • Update to SqlClient 5.2-preview2 #31085
    type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Additional cleanup and modernization #31084
  • Improve expression debugging #31082

Merged

  • Uncomment test output helpers everywhere #31017

Updated

  • Add complex types to Metadata #31003
  • Json reader sandbox rebase #31076
  • [release/7.x] Disable trigger enumeration on Azure Synapse Analytics, where triggers are not supported #31036
    Servicing-approved, community-contribution, 7.0.x
